channel.title: [delta] make Npc's agresive [317]
channel.description:
hey how can i make npc's agresive and how can i do them a other atk then just melee like range or mage
hope u help me ;D

item.title: [delta] make Npc's agresive [317]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

To make aggressive, open npchandler.java
search for:

public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {

below that you will see a list of cases, the number represents the NPC ID, for example the KBD has an ID of 50, therefore you would add:

case 50:

in that list (on a new line)

As for the other part of your question. I’m not fully sure, but I guess it would be in the same file. There is something in there called:

CreateProjectile

which I noticed was used for monsters that have non-melee attacks, but you would need to add the correct emotes and GFX as well

Read full topic
